import React from 'react'; import 'rbx/index.css'; import { Card, Dropdown, Button, Content, Media, Title } from 'rbx'; const Product = ({ product, addToCart }) => { return (
addToCart(product.sku, 'S')}>Size: S addToCart(product.sku, 'M')}>Size: M addToCart(product.sku, 'L')}>Size: L addToCart(product.sku, 'XL')}>Size: XL {product.title} {'$' + product.price} {product.style} ) } export default Product;
